Package org.megatome.frame2.front

Provides classes that make up the Front Controller.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RequestProcessor The request processor is the delegate for use by servlets in processing HTTP requests.
 

Class Summary
HttpRequestProcessor A request models the execution of an HTTP request through the Event and the EventHandlers.
SoapRequestProcessor A request models the execution of a SOAP request through the Event and the EventHandlers.
 

Exception Summary
AuthorizationException Exception thrown when a user does not have access to a resource.
ConfigException A ConfigException indicates that an error was encountered in the processing or instantiation of the Frame2 configuration.
TranslationException Exception thrown whenever an error occurrs translating a SOAP message to an event
ViewException Exception thrown when an error occurs looking up or resolving a view.
 

Package org.megatome.frame2.front Description

Provides classes that make up the Front Controller.

The Front Controller is responsible for parsing the configuration file, and listens for requests on a servlet. The servlet sends these requests to the request processor, which may be the HttpRequestProcessor, SoapRequestProcessor, or a custom request processor created by a developer.

Since:
1.0
